eventSummary:
Hackers are exploiting an undocumented vulnerability in the cryptographic algorithm implementation within Gladinet's CentreStack and Triofox products for secure remote file access and sharing, leading to RCE attacks.
Sources:
- https://www.bleepingcomputer.com

Yearn Finance, a defi yield protocol, suffered its third hack due to bugs in its smart contract. The exploiter drained assets from several pools by minting a large number of yETH tokens and withdrawing corresponding assets. $2.4 million in pxETH, a liquid staking token issued by Redacted Cartel, was recovered after Redacted Cartel burned and reissued the stolen tokens.
Sources:
- https://web3isgoinggreat.com/single/yearn-finance-hack-3

The attacker reportedly exfiltrated 950,000 records, including client names, mobile numbers, optional emails, policy tiers, and contract types tied to the Atradius and Crédito y Caución divisions.
Sources:
- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3m7ossmdwez2c
